title: Malaysia to review $3.9 billion settlement deal with Goldman Sachs - PM Anwar
description: KUALA LUMPUR : The Malaysian government is re-evaluating a $3.9 billion settlement deal reached between the previous administration and U.S. investment bank Goldman Sachs over the 1MDB financial scandal, state news agency Bernama reported on Monday. title: More chaos at Egyptian champions Zamalek as club president excluded

title: Indonesia posts $8.7 billion Q1 budget surplus, stronger rupiah seen cutting deficit outlook

title: Tesla margins in focus as EV price war kicks into high gear
description: :Tesla Inc's first-quarter margins are anticipated to have hit a more than three-year low as the electric-vehicle maker slashed prices to lure more buyers in the face of rising competition and a weak economy. title: ChatGPT's AI to power Chegg study buddy as educators wrestle with tech

title: Myanmar's Wa militia to suspend mining in its zone from Aug, tin prices jump

title: BOJ forecasts FY2025 CPI to rise 1.6-1.9% - Jiji

title: Temperature rose above 36°C on Apr 14; warm weather set to continue: Met Service
description: SINGAPORE: The mercury rose above 36 degrees Celsius in the first half of April, with the warm weather in the first fortnight expected to continue for the rest of the month, the Meteorological Service Singapore (Met Service) said on Monday (Apr 17). title: Russia jails Putin critic Kara-Murza for 25 years
